Text.Page:
Are you contemplating a solitary exercise to demonstrate your acuity?

Consider the Ace Dungeonsâ€”open Instance Matching and select the second tab, marked Ace Dungeons. From there, select a trial (a solo version of some familiar dungeons) and one or more tasks for a chance to earn ace medals. The better you do, the more medals you earn.

Turn in the medals on the same interface. You have limited attempts for each trial each day, so make them count!
Test yourself in an Ace Dungeon.
